duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in gathering requirements, leading, designing, and providing guidance on recommendations.
Collaborate with the business on current processes and propose solutions to enhance them.
Ensure systems are aligned with the IT long term strategy.
Identify, recommend, and implement complex configuration solutions and create associated documentation.
Set testing strategy for modules and lead end to end integration testing.
Participate in the delivery of project and minor/major releases.
Troubleshoot and lead the evaluation and design of the correction for complex incidents.
Maintain a high level of functional competency regarding the standard configuration of the Extended Warehouse Management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred)
